if.test: userRole != null and userRole != '' and userRole.equals('RA')

select.if:
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(UR_IDX) , '0') AS CNT /* 회원 SUM */ FROM CDT_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ROLE IN('RU')
UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(RT_IDX) , '0') FROM CDT_RENT_COMPANY /* 회원사 SUM */
UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(QU_IDX) , '0') FROM CDT_QUOTE_USER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') /* 유저 요청 SUM TODAY */
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(RM_IDX) FROM CDT_RESERVE_MASTER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') /* 계약 완료 SUM TODAY */
UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(UR_IDX) , '0') FROM CDT_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ROLE IN('RU') AND TO_CHAR(REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') /* 회원가입자 SUM TODAY */
UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(T1.PAYMENT_AMOUNT), '0') FROM CDT_PAYMENT_DETAIL T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CDT_RESERVE_MASTER T2 ON T1.RM_IDX = T2.RM_IDX WHERE TO_CHAR(T1.PAYMENT_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') /* 결제완료 SUM TODAY */
UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL( COUNT(QR_IDX), '0') FROM CDT_QUOTE_RENT_COMPANY WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') /* 회원사 요청 SUM TODAY */
